content.question: Which of the following elements of Fang life best describes and accounts for artistic production of works such as the Fang byeri ?

choices.label: The hierarchical organization of their society
The impact of their colonial experience

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
